rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Main entry area with wheelchair-accessible ramp leading into the house

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the front; designed for comfortable gathering and Vastu principles alignment.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to living area; includes a large dining table

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with wheelchair-accessible design and ample space for appliances.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with ensuite bathroom; positioned in a Vastu-compliant zone

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Functional space for work or study; integrates natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Area for storage and utilities, wheelchair accessible design features

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible door with automatic opening mechanism

openings.name: Front Windows
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light and ventilation

openings.name: Swimming Pool Access Door
openings.description: Door leading to the swimming pool area from the house
